body:
If you remove a user from all the teams, the user's account gets locked. The user cannot do anything after logging in.

However, the user's data remains intact. When you add the removed user back to a team, the user's data is available again. 

If the user who is removed from all the teams still has a HackerRank for Work account, then the user still has the access to questions and tests that the user created. Besides the user, only the members of the owners team have access to the user's data who is no longer part of any team.
title: What happens when you remove a user from all the teams?
